ability.name: Rabbit Out of a Hat
ability.description: * You may not place a card on Rabbit Out of a Hat if it matches the suit of the card already on Rabbit Out of a Hat. * The suit of Major Arcana cards is "Major". * Cards sitting on Rabbit Out of a Hat remain there. * While there are any cards on Rabbit Out of a Hat, you cannot play cards on Unarmed Strike or Defend. * When all five cards (one from each suit) are present: * Discard the Minor Arcana from Rabbit Out of a Hat. * Draw the remaining card from Rabbit Out of a Hat into hand: treat it as a Magician for the remainder of the turn.
ability.flavor: A trick isn't that impressive on it's own: line up a few in a row, though, and you've got a show.
